entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10 except minus 6 inland.
